original_text: Behold, he was honourable among the thirty, but attained not to the first three: and David set him over his guard.
korean_text: 삼십 명 중에서는 뛰어나나 첫째 세 사람에게는 미치지 못하니라 다윗이 그를 세워 시위대장을 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: Behold, he was honourable among the thirty
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그는 삼십인 중에서 존귀한 자였으나

sentences.original_text: but attained not to the first three
and David set him over his guard
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 그를 자기 시위대 장관으로 삼았더라
